text.tspan: → Nomads learn about and envy civilized wealth
but often clashes with each side having its own advantages
because nomads can't or won't maintain it

g.text: civilisation starts to revive for several reasons:

text.tspan: - Nomads get attached to civilized comforts
- Nomads marry civ. women who raise the children
- Nomads learn to appreciate and maintain civilisations
